languages.text: {n}По сравнению с тем, каким он был в Анатомической опере, Хейнрикс выглядит почти как обычно. Однако вы все же подмечаете, как опущены его плечи и как подергивается уголок его рта: дознаватель устал. Вероятно, биомантия потребовала от него больше усилий, чем он рассчитывал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}По сравнению с тем, каким он был в Анатомической опере, Хейнрикс выглядит почти как обычно. Однако вы все же подмечаете, как опущены его плечи и как подергивается уголок его рта: дознаватель устал. Вероятно, биомансия потребовала от него больше усилий, чем он рассчитывал.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}По сравнению с тем, каким он был в Анатомической опере, Хейнрикс выглядит почти как обычно. Однако вы все же подмечаете, как опущены его плечи и как подергивается уголок его рта: дознаватель устал. Вероятно, биомантия потребовала от него больше усилий, чем он рассчитывал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}

{n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}

{n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}

{n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}

languages.text: {n}和他在解剖歌剧院时的样子相比，海因里希现在看起来似乎和平时没什么区别，但你却注意到了他下垂的肩膀与抽搐的嘴角。他已经精疲力尽了。施展生物法术消耗的能量，肯定是超出了他的预期。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}和他在解剖歌剧院时的样子相比，海因里希现在看起来似乎和平时没什么区别，但你却注意到了他下垂的肩膀与抽搐的嘴角。他已经精疲力尽了。施展生物法术消耗的能量，肯定是超出了他的预期。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En comparación con su aspecto en la Ópera Anatómica, Heinrix casi parece ser el de siempre. Sin embargo, notas que tiene los hombros caídos y un tic en la comisura. Está agotado. La biomancia debe haber socavado sus fuerzas más de lo que esperaba.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En comparación con su aspecto en la Ópera Anatómica, Heinrix casi parece ser el de siempre. Sin embargo, notas que tiene los hombros caídos y un tic en la comisura. Está agotado. La biomancia debe haber socavado sus fuerzas más de lo que esperaba.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アナトミカル・オペラの頃と比べれば、ハインリックスはほとんど普段と変わらない。しかし、彼の肩の落ち方と口角のけいれんが目についた…彼は疲れていたのだ。生体秘法で予想以上にエネルギーを消耗したのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アナトミカル・オペラの頃と比べれば、ハインリックスはほとんど普段と変わらない。しかし、彼の肩の落ち方と口角のけいれんが目についた…彼は疲れていたのだ。生体秘法で予想以上にエネルギーを消耗したのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Par rapport à l'état dans lequel il était à l'Opéra anatomique, Heinrix semble être redevenu lui-même, ou presque. Il a toutefois l'air épuisé, comme l'indiquent ses épaules affaissées et le coin de sa bouche qui frémit involontairement. Sa biomancie a dû lui coûter plus d'énergie qu'il ne l'avait anticipé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Par rapport à l'état dans lequel il était à l'Opéra anatomique, Heinrix semble être redevenu lui-même, ou presque. Il a toutefois l'air épuisé, comme l'indiquent ses épaules affaissées et le coin de sa bouche qui frémit involontairement. Sa biomancie a dû lui coûter plus d'énergie qu'il ne l'avait anticipé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Verglichen mit seinem Anblick während der Anatomischen Oper sieht Heinrix nahezu normal aus. Dir fällt trotzdem auf, dass seine Schultern herunterhängen und seine Mundwinkel zucken – er ist erschöpft. Seine Biomantie muss ihn mehr Kraft gekostet haben, als er erwartet hatte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Verglichen mit seinem Anblick während der Anatomischen Oper sieht Heinrix nahezu normal aus. Dir fällt trotzdem auf, dass seine Schultern herunterhängen und seine Mundwinkel zucken – er ist erschöpft. Seine Biomantie muss ihn mehr Kraft gekostet haben, als er erwartet hatte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Anatomi Operası'ndaki hâline kıyasla Heinrix, neredeyse her zamanki kendisiymiş gibi duruyor. Ancak omuzlarının çöküşü ve dudağının kenarındaki seğirme, gözünden kaçmıyor. Heinrix, tükenmiş bir hâlde. Biyobazlığı, enerjisini beklediğinden çok daha fazla miktarda çekmiş olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Compared to how he was in the Anatomical Opera, Heinrix looks almost like his usual self. But you cannot help noticing the sag in his shoulders and the twitch at the corner of his mouth — he is exhausted. His biomancy must have sapped more energy than he expected.{/n}
